env HOME=$WORK/home

gobin github.com/gobin-testrepos/simple-main@v1.0.0
stdout '^Installed github.com/gobin-testrepos/simple-main@v1.0.0 to '$WORK/gopath/bin/simple-main'$'
! stderr .+

gobin github.com/gobin-testrepos/simple-main@latest
stdout '^Installed github.com/gobin-testrepos/simple-main@v1.0.0 to '$WORK/gopath/bin/simple-main'$'
! stderr .+

gobin -u github.com/gobin-testrepos/simple-main@latest
stdout '^Installed github.com/gobin-testrepos/simple-main@v1.1.0 to '$WORK/gopath/bin/simple-main'$'
! stderr .+
